name: Savestate (Orange Carnation)
description:
Savestate is a short game about remembering to save frequently.

FEATURES-

  • Swearing!
  • Music I made!
  • Graphics I (mostly) did NOT make!
  • Easter eggs!
  • Silly dialogue!
  • A whopping FIVE things to do to progress, and an additional secret thing that lets you skip one of those!
  • Is essentially held together by tape!

Made for One Game A Month Jam #3, with the theme "one shot"
